Pinyin1: wūguī hé tùzi sàipǎo de gùshi
Chinese1: 乌龟和兔子赛跑的故事
Translate1: The story of turtles and rabbits racing

Pinyin1: tùzi yǒu sìtiáo tuǐ
Translate1: Rabbit has four legs

Pinyin1: yībèngyī tiào ， pǎo dé kěkuài lā
Translate1: Jumping and jumping, running quickly

Pinyin1: wūguī yě yǒu sìtiáo tuǐ
Translate1: Turtles also have four legs

Pinyin1: pá ya ， pá ya ， pá dé zhēnmàn
Translate1: Climbing, climbing, climbing really slowly

Pinyin1: yǒu yītiān ， tùzi pèngjiàn wūguī
Translate1: One day, the rabbit meets the turtle

Pinyin1: kànjiàn wūguī pá dé zhème màn
Translate1: Seeing the turtle climb so slowly

Pinyin1: tùzi jiù xiǎng xìnòng xìnòng tā
Translate1: Rabbit wants to tease him to tease him

Pinyin1: yúshì xiàomīmī deshuō ： “ wūguī ， wūguī ， zánmen lái sàipǎo ， hǎo ma ？ ”
Chinese1: 于是笑眯眯地说：“乌龟，乌龟，咱们来赛跑，好吗？”
Translate1: So he said with a smile: "Turtles, turtles, let's run, okay?

Pinyin1: wūguī zhīdào tùzi zài kāi tā wánxiào
Chinese1: 乌龟知道兔子在开他玩笑
Translate1: The turtle knows the rabbit is joking at him

Pinyin1: dèng zhe yīshuāng xiǎo yǎnjīng
Translate1: Staring a pair of small eyes

Pinyin1: bù lǐcǎi tùzi
Translate1: Ignore the rabbit

Pinyin1: tùzi zhīdào wūguī bùgǎn gēn tā sàipǎo
Chinese1: 兔子知道乌龟不敢跟他赛跑
Translate1: The rabbit knows that the turtle dare not run with him

Pinyin1: kāixīn de bèngbèngtiàotiào
Translate1: Happy bouncing

Pinyin1: huán biān le yīzhī shāngē xiàohuà tā ：
Chinese1: 还编了一支山歌笑话他：
Translate1: He also compiled a folk song joke:

Pinyin1: wūguī ， wūguī ， pá pá pá
Translate1: Turtles, turtles, climbing

Pinyin1: yīzǎo chūmén cǎihuā
Translate1: Go out early in the morning to pick flowers

Pinyin1: wūguī ， wūguī ， zǒuzǒu zǒu
Translate1: Turtles, turtles, walk away

Pinyin1: bàngwǎn huán zài ménkǒu
Translate1: Still at the door in the evening

Pinyin1: wūguī shēngqì le
Translate1: The turtles are angry

Pinyin1: shuō ： “ tùzi ， tùzi ， nǐ biéshén línghuó xiàn de ， zánmen zhè jiù lái sàipǎo ! ”
Chinese1: 说：“兔子，兔子，你别神灵活现的，咱们这就来赛跑!”
Translate1: Said: "Rabbit, rabbit, don't be embarrassed, let's run here!

Pinyin1: tùzi huídá shuōdao
Translate1: Rabbit answered

Pinyin1: “ shénme ？ wūguī ， nǐ shuō shénme ？ ”
Translate1: What? Turtles, what are you talking about?

Pinyin1: wūguī shuō ： “ zánmen zhè jiù lái sàipǎo 。 ”
Chinese1: 乌龟说：“咱们这就来赛跑。”
Translate1: The turtle said, "Let's run here.

Pinyin1: tùzi yītīng ， chàdiǎn xiào pò le dùzi
Chinese1: 兔子一听，差点笑破了肚子
Translate1: When the rabbit heard it, I almost smiled and broke my belly

Pinyin1: tùzi shuō ： “ wūguī ， nǐ zhēngǎn gēn wǒ sàipǎo ？
Chinese1: 兔子说：“乌龟，你真敢跟我赛跑？
Translate1: The rabbit said, "Turtle, do you really dare to run with me?

Pinyin1: nàhǎo ， zánmen cóng zhèr pǎo qǐ
Translate1: Well, let's run from here

Pinyin1: kàn shéi xiān pǎo dào nàbian shānjiǎoxià de yīkē dàshù
Chinese1: 看谁先跑到那边山脚下的一棵大树
Translate1: See who runs to a big tree at the foot of the mountain over there

Pinyin1: yùbèi ！ yī ， èr ， sān ，    ”
Translate1: preparation! one two Three,---

Pinyin1: tùzi sākāi tuǐ jiù pǎo ， pǎo dé zhēnkuài
Chinese1: 兔子撒开腿就跑，跑得真快
Translate1: The rabbit sprinkled and ran away, running so fast

Pinyin1: tùzi yīhuìr jiù pǎo dé hěn yuǎn le
Chinese1: 兔子一会儿就跑得很远了
Translate1: The rabbit runs far away for a while

Pinyin1: tā huítóuyīkàn ， wūguī cái pá le yīxiǎo duànlù ne
Chinese1: 他回头一看，乌龟才爬了一小段路呢
Translate1: When he looked back, the turtle climbed a short while

Pinyin1: tùzi xīnxiǎng ： wūguī gǎn gēn tùzi sàipǎo ， zhēnshi tiāndà de xiàohuà ！
Chinese1: 兔子心想：乌龟敢跟兔子赛跑，真是天大的笑话！
Translate1: The rabbit thought: Turtles dare to run with rabbits, it is a big joke!

Pinyin1: wǒ ya ， zài zhèr shuìshàng yīdà jué
Chinese1: 我呀，在这儿睡上一大觉
Translate1: I, I sleep here

Pinyin1: ràng tā pá dào zhèr ， bù ， ràng tā pá dào qiánmiàn qù bā
Chinese1: 让他爬到这儿，不，让他爬到前面去吧
Translate1: Let him climb here, no, let him climb in front

Pinyin1: wǒ sān bèng èr tiào de jiù zhuīshàng tā le
Chinese1: 我三蹦二跳的就追上他了
Translate1: I caught up with him in three jumps

Pinyin1: tùzi shuō ： “ lā lā lā ， shènglì zhǔnshì wǒ de ma ！ ”
Chinese1: 兔子说：“啦啦啦，胜利准是我的嘛！”
Translate1: The rabbit said, "La la la, the victory is me!

Pinyin1: tùzi bǎ shēnzi wǎng dìshang yī tǎng
Chinese1: 兔子把身子往地上一躺
Translate1: Rabbit lying on the ground and lying on the ground

Pinyin1: hé shàngyǎnpí ， zhēnde shuìzháo le
Translate1: Follow your eyelids, really fall asleep

Pinyin1: zàishuō wūguī ， pá dé yě zhēnmàn
Translate1: Besides the turtle, it is really slow to climb

Pinyin1: kěshì tā yīgèjìnr dì pá ， pá ya ， pá ya ， pá
Chinese1: 可是他一个劲儿地爬，爬呀，爬呀，爬
Translate1: But he climbed, climbed, climbed, climbing

Pinyin1: děng tā pá dào tùzi shēnbiān
Translate1: Wait for him to climb to the rabbit

Pinyin1: yǐjīng jīnpílìjìn le
Translate1: I'm exhausted

Pinyin1: tùzi huán zài shuìjiào
Translate1: Rabbit is still sleeping

Pinyin1: wūguī yě xiǎng xiūxi yīhuìr
Translate1: The turtles also want to rest for a while

Pinyin1: kě tā zhīdào tùzi pǎo dé bǐ tā kuài
Chinese1: 可他知道兔子跑得比他快
Translate1: But he knew that the rabbit ran faster than him

Pinyin1: zhǐyǒu jiānchí páxiàqù cái yǒu kěnéng yíng
Chinese1: 只有坚持爬下去才有可能赢
Translate1: It is only possible to win if you keep climbing down

Pinyin1: yúshì ， tā bùtíng dì wǎngqián pá  pá  pá
Chinese1: 于是，他不停地往前爬、爬、爬
Translate1: So he kept climbing, climbing, climbing

Pinyin1: lí dàshù yuèláiyuèjìn le
Translate1: It's getting closer to the big tree

Pinyin1: zhǐchā jǐshíbù le
Translate1: Only dozens of steps

Pinyin1: huán shèng shíjǐbù le ， jǐbù le ， zhōngyú dào le
Chinese1: 还剩十几步了，几步了，终于到了
Translate1: There are more than ten steps left, a few steps, and finally arrived

Pinyin1: tùzi ne ？ tā huán zài shuìjiào ne ！
Translate1: What about rabbits? He is still sleeping!

Pinyin1: tùzi xǐnglái hòu wǎnghòu yīkàn
Translate1: After the rabbit wakes up, look back and look back

Pinyin1: āi ， wūguī zěnme bùjiàn le
Translate1: Alas, why is the turtle gone?

Pinyin1: zài wǎngqián yīkàn
Translate1: Look forward

Pinyin1: āiyā ， bùdéliǎo le
Translate1: Oops, it's so terrible

Pinyin1: wūguī yǐjīng pá dào dà shùdǐxià le
Chinese1: 乌龟已经爬到大树底下了
Translate1: The turtle has climbed under the big tree

Pinyin1: tùzi yīkàn kějí le
Translate1: The rabbit can be anxious at first glance

Pinyin1: jímáng gǎnshàngqù kě yǐjīng wǎn le
Chinese1: 急忙赶上去可已经晚了
Translate1: Hurry up, but it's too late

Pinyin1: wūguī yǐjīng yíng le
Translate1: Turtles have won

Pinyin1: tùzi pǎodékuài ， wūguī pǎodémàn
Chinese1: 兔子跑得快，乌龟跑得慢
Translate1: The rabbit runs fast, the turtle runs slowly

Pinyin1: wèishénme zhècì bǐsài wūguī fǎnér yíng le ne ？
Chinese1: 为什么这次比赛乌龟反而赢了呢？
Translate1: Why did the turtles win this game?
